articles.author: Lexy Perez
articles.title: Suki Waterhouse Recalls Meeting Robert Pattinson, Says They “Really Planned” Pregnancy - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: "One day we looked at each other and said, ‘Well, this is as ready as we’re going to be,'" the actress and singer said.
articles.content:
Actress and singer Suki Waterhouse is looking back on her meet-cute moment with Robert Pattinson as they recently welcomed a baby girl. 
In a cover interview for British Vogue‘s August issue, Waterh… [+2254 chars]
